experience.title: Human Resources Business Partner
experience.description: â€¢ Competent HR Business Partner for multiple client businesses within one of the largest verticals â€“ HMS (Hitech, Manufacturing and Services)â€¢ Engaging with client partners and Genpact leadership to strategize people practices and deliver business outcomes through development of right culture, capabilities, high performing teams and people engagementâ€¢ Coaching and developing leaders to take informed decisions by providing regular dashboards and insightsâ€¢ Managing the annual performance management, quarterly succession planning and salary revisionsâ€¢ Responsible for handling Employee Relations and Employee Grievancesâ€¢ Managing attrition and employee retention initiativesâ€¢ Implementing and managing employee engagement initiativesâ€¢ Conducting compliance investigations and taking corrective action on defaulters

experience.title: Human Resources Business Partner
experience.description: â€¢ Dedicated HRBP for 950+ employees across 17 states and 12 Business Units for Respiratory Cluster (India Business)â€¢ Acting as a responsible strategic business partner and ensuring HR support towards meeting overall business goalsâ€¢ Identifying, building and nurturing talent to deliver superior business results while fulfilling individual career aspirations through Succession Planningâ€¢ Responsible for Leadership Hiringâ€¢ Responsible for competency building of leadership through various workshops and training programsâ€¢ Managing Employee Relations and Employee Grievances by taking appropriate actions basis investigationâ€¢ Conducting compliance investigations and taking suitable action on defaulted employeesâ€¢ Responsible for Diversity & Inclusionâ€¢ Facilitating Townhalls and Focus Group Interactions with employee cohortsâ€¢ Implementing and managing employee engagement initiativesâ€¢ Managing the end-to-end yearly appraisal processâ€¢ Analysing attrition data and taking suitable action on managers with high attrition in their span of controlâ€¢ Administering and monitoring PIP for low performersâ€¢ Coaching and developing leaders to take informed decisions by providing regular dashboards and insights on performance, staffing, attrition and engagementâ€¢ Collaborating with business for implementation of HR processes like confirmation, transfers, deputation, promotions, etcâ€¢ Partnering with HR COEs to drive and implement regular HR processes to deliver effective and seamless day to day management of employee lifecycle
experience.description_html: â€¢ Dedicated HRBP for 950+ employees across 17 states and 12 Business Units for Respiratory Cluster (India Business)â€¢ Acting as a responsible strategic business partner and ensuring HR support towards meeting overall business goalsâ€¢ Identifying, building and nurturing talent to deliver superior business results while fulfilling individual career aspirations through Succession Planningâ€¢ Responsible for Leadership Hiringâ€¢ Responsible for competency building of leadership through various workshops and training programsâ€¢ Managing Employee Relations and Employee Grievances by taking appropriate actions basis investigationâ€¢ Conducting compliance investigations and taking suitable action on defaulted employeesâ€¢ Responsible for Diversity & Inclusionâ€¢ Facilitating Townhalls and Focus Group Interactions with employee cohortsâ€¢ Implementing and managing employee engagement initiativesâ€¢ Managing the end-to-end yearly appraisal processâ€¢ Analysing attrition data and taking suitable action on managers with high attrition in their span of controlâ€¢ Administering and monitoring PIP for low performersâ€¢ Coaching and developing leaders to take informed decisions by providing regular dashboards and insights on performance, staffing, attrition and engagementâ€¢ Collaborating with business for implementation of HR processes like confirmation, transfers, deputation, promotions, etcâ€¢ Partnering with HR COEs to drive and implement regular HR processes to deliver effective and seamless day to day management of employee lifecycle
